title: MFW Deep Terror Nami gets the boot...

replies.body: I'm legit sad about DTN losing Arbiter status. (S)he was awesome, friendly, and pretty professional about everything. It sucks that Riot revoked Arbiter just because they got told off for being lazy mods...
He explained it was the last straw. This means he was warned about his behavior before and chose not to change it. Please read carefully next time.

This makes me respect them more not less personally. I don't respect "bad behavior", but I'm also glad someone didn't get power tripped and change themselves and what their real opinions are-which didn't get hidden.
Truth hurts. Sadly.

i am legitimately sad. Fuck RIOT and their moderation. The only reason why DTN was booted was because he actually responded to people. The curator just sits there and lectures people on not calling others trolls.

Honestly the curator is one of my least favorite people on these boards. If riot thinks nami was being passive aggressive, they should look at half the shit the curator says as he is one of the most disrespectful people on this boards. Too bad riot cares more about self image preservation than they do board users feelings.
Really tho, he basically said "fuck you" to me and was all "you better watch your language" after I got temp banned for calling someone a troll...

honestly I can't remember a specific time when he was a dick, but it's more of the overall memory of reading some of his comments and being like wow, that was a dick response. I remember one thread where he got butt hurt over something and all of the comments below it here like "Haha thecurator is getting so sassy" but it was really just being rude for no reason.
He's just an ass. The mod system on the boards is completely terrible. I am beyond angry
What is the name of the moderator? :o I got curious now

YES!
In the entire time he was talking to me and being inconsistent, most of the stuff he said sounded SO passive-aggressive and condescending...
What is wrong with Deep Sea Nami?
Deep Terror Nami, a famous boards user who used to work with riot.
So Deep Terror Nami betrayed you guys?
Riot pretty much betrayed him/her
I am now disappearing in the shadows, because I don't care for Nami.
http://img.ifcdn.com/images/6c8790ef3c808b2e82f77ef8ce19f2d58dde43de3a7df77b4a452de16a47d031_1.jpg
I really thought we were talking about the skin for the champion. I thought she could finally wear a boot when I read teh post. Never understood it was about the person himself.
something about being too passive aggressive. It was total bullshit. See her post on the top page.
didn't he kinda call out Riot or something like that? Id be surprised that they kept him around after that

he did. 
the actual reason is
"being unprofessional and referencing someone as a troll".
yeah...
it's a tricky world trying to listen to people that disagree with your opinion

How did you make this gif?
I have an idea for a gif based on a YouTube video but I don't know how to make it
https://media.giphy.com/media/5AwCyy5Ji4wm7BPFoQ0/giphy.gif

hmmmmm But if I tell you my secret is revealed... 

Fine, when you go to the youtube videos website in the URL above insert the word "gif" in front of the word youtube.

For example:
www.youtube.com/blahblahblah
Change it to
www.gifyoutube.com/blahblahblah
Thank you, but how did you add the text?

I understand the context of your question now. the text in the gif...

I just had to figure it out, but there are editing options on the left side of the gif "add caption" then you slide the bars at the bottom to show when the text starts and ends in the gif
https://media4.giphy.com/media/3oEjHTKRlY6g5XgfSw/giphy.gif

That will be $1,000,000,000

http://i.imgur.com/QRcFcVC.gif"
https://media.giphy.com/media/12XMGIWtrHBl5e/giphy.gif
How about I keep my knives down and we call it even
That sir is called a threat. :P

I'd refer to it more as a mutual gain

We gain new tools, and you gain the right to keep your life

Besides... No ones watching
Agreed. You don't stab anyone. I don't charge $1,000,000

Excellent call, see you next riddle

Or sooner...

Bwhahahaha!!! Jokes on you! 

You agreed not to stab anyone and I only said I would rescind $1,000,000

That means everyone still owes me $999,000,000

Don't mess with the riddler.

*Walks back in, shoves knife into your neck 12 times, Walks back out*

No one pulls a fast one on me...
Your lucky I have a limitless supply of those things

*walks slowly away carrying miscellaneous knives and box traps*

Yeah, No one pulls a fast one.
http://25.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_m8ghad1qJe1qkvue8o1_500.gif
You should have seen what I did to Face the Sun
Wow. That escalated quickly.
Still worth it.
http://38.media.tumblr.com/81a95d7091aaf46214b365c4b495091f/tumblr_mo8pslhj9D1qf5tr5o3_500.gif

god look at all these cringey nuthuggers tryna stick it to the man. would you want someone working for you talking crap about your other employees and your business in general? of course you wouldnt care, you wouldnt know how to deal with it because you're all basement dwelling neckbeards with no responsibilities. thankfully thats where you'll stay the rest of your lives because you dont know the first thing about the real world because any little school you've paid attention to and remembered doesnt tell you anything about running successful businesses and social workplace interactions, where you need to keep your workers in line or you get rid of them, otherwise they drag your whole company reputation down limiting further growth with potential stakeholders/clients/customers who dont wanna invest their time and/or money into a company where their own employees are saying they're lazy and lax
I just miss DTN. That is all.
its for the people in the comments , your gif is fine

I bet you are fun at parties.
If you got invited to any that is.
